name: Walter M. STRINE, Walter M. Strine, Jr. and William B. Strine Trading as Commonwealth Real Estate Investors D/B/A Chester Care Center, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Medical Care Availability and Reduction of Error Fund and John H. Reed, Former Director of Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, Appellees

parties: Walter M. STRINE, Walter M. Strine, Jr. and William B. Strine Trading as Commonwealth Real Estate Investors D/B/A Chester Care Center, Appellants v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Medical Care Availability and Reduction of Error Fund and John H. Reed, Former Director of Medical Professional Liability Catastrophe Loss Fund, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of August, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
858 A.2d 1156
Walter M. STRINE, Walter M. Strine, Jr. and William B. Strine Trading as Commonwealth Real Estate Investors D/B/A Chester Care Center, Appellants v. Aug. 16, 2004.
